blocks.name: coprmdvdsb
blocks.content: Multiplication by a coprime number does not affect divisibility. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 23-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm coprmdvdsb(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c2), nat1))), wb(wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, cmul, c1))))
} = {
  impbid(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c2), nat1))), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, cmul, c1)))
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c2), nat1))), wi(wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, cmul, c1))), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz))
  dvdsmultr2(c0, c2, c1)
  mpan2d(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c2), nat1))), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, cmul, c1)), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c2), nat1))
  simp3r(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c2), nat1))
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c2), nat1))), wi(wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, cmul, c1)), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c2), nat1)), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1)), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c2), nat1)))
  simp3l(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c2), nat1))
  simp2(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c2), nat1)))
  coprmdvds(c0, c2, c1)
}

blocks.name: modabsdifz
blocks.content: Divisibility in terms of modular reduction by the absolute value of the base. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 26-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm modabsdifz(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0)), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, co(c0, cmo, cfv(cabs, c1))), cdiv, c1), cz))
} = {
  mpbid(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0)), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, co(c0, cmo, cfv(cabs, c1))), cdiv, c1), cz), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, co(c0, cmo, cfv(cabs, c1))), cdiv, cfv(cabs, c1)), cz))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0)), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, co(c0, cmo, cfv(cabs, c1))), cdiv, cfv(cabs, c1)), cz), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cfv(cabs, c1), crp))
  moddifz(c0, cfv(cabs, c1))
  3bitr4d(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0)), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, co(c0, cmo, cfv(cabs, c1))), cdiv, cfv(cabs, c1)), cz), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, co(c0, cmo, cfv(cabs, c1))), cdiv, c1), cz), wcel(cfv(cabs, co(co(c0, cmin, co(c0, cmo, cfv(cabs, c1))), cdiv, cfv(cabs, c1))), cz), wcel(cfv(cabs, co(co(c0, cmin, co(c0, cmo, cfv(cabs, c1))), cdiv, c1)), cz))
  eleq1d(cfv(cabs, co(co(c0, cmin, co(c0, cmo, cfv(cabs, c1))), cdiv, cfv(cabs, c1))), cz, cfv(cabs, co(co(c0, cmin, co(c0, cmo, cfv(cabs, c1))), cdiv, c1)), w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0)))
  3eqtr4d(cfv(cabs, co(co(c0, cmin, co(c0, cmo, cfv(cabs, c1))), cdiv, cfv(cabs, c1))), cfv(cabs, co(co(c0, cmin, co(c0, cmo, cfv(cabs, c1))), cdiv, c1)), co(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmin, co(c0, cmo, cfv(cabs, c1)))), cdiv, cfv(cabs, cfv(cabs, c1))), co(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmin, co(c0, cmo, cfv(cabs, c1)))), cdiv, cfv(cabs, c1)), w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0)))
  oveq2d(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmin, co(c0, cmo, cfv(cabs, c1)))), cdiv, cfv(cabs, cfv(cabs, c1)), cfv(cabs, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0)))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0)), wceq(cfv(cabs, cfv(cabs, c1)), cfv(cabs, c1)), wcel(c1, cc))
  absidm(c1)
  absdivd(co(c0, cmin, co(c0, cmo, cfv(cabs, c1))), cfv(cabs, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0)))
  recnd(cfv(cabs, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0)))
  absdivd(co(c0, cmin, co(c0, cmo, cfv(cabs, c1))), c1, w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0)))
  recnd(co(c0, cmin, co(c0, cmo, cfv(cabs, c1))), w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0)))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0)), wb(wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, co(c0, cmo, cfv(cabs, c1))), cdiv, cfv(cabs, c1)), cz), wcel(cfv(cabs, co(co(c0, cmin, co(c0, cmo, cfv(cabs, c1))), cdiv, cfv(cabs, c1))), cz)), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, co(c0, cmo, cfv(cabs, c1))), cdiv, cfv(cabs, c1)), cr))
  redivcld(co(c0, cmin, co(c0, cmo, cfv(cabs, c1))), cfv(cabs, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0)))
  abscld(c1, w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0)))
  rpne0d(cfv(cabs, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0)))
  absz(co(co(c0, cmin, co(c0, cmo, cfv(cabs, c1))), cdiv, cfv(cabs, c1)))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0)), wb(wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, co(c0, cmo, cfv(cabs, c1))), cdiv, c1), cz), wcel(cfv(cabs, co(co(c0, cmin, co(c0, cmo, cfv(cabs, c1))), cdiv, c1)), cz)), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, co(c0, cmo, cfv(cabs, c1))), cdiv, c1), cr))
  redivcld(co(c0, cmin, co(c0, cmo, cfv(cabs, c1))), c1, w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0)))
  resubcld(c0, co(c0, cmo, cfv(cabs, c1)), w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0)))
  modcld(c0, cfv(cabs, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0)))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0))
  absrpcld(c1, w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0)))
  recnd(c1, w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0)))
  simp2(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0))
  simp3(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0))
  absz(co(co(c0, cmin, co(c0, cmo, cfv(cabs, c1))), cdiv, c1))
}
